law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other law, it is lawful to keep and operate a free-play pinball machine or free-...
law.text: Notwithstanding any other law, it is lawful to keep and operate a free-play pinball machine or free-play console machine and to award free games to players if the free-play pinball machine or free-play console machine is licensed under Part II of this subtitle.
